thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Christina Smyth
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Christina Smyth

author: Christina Smyth
title: Christina Smyth
text: The Team at Easy Signs calls themselves CUSTOMER HAPPINESS TEAM for a reason - I may not have met the Team members in person, but they all come across as a really happy. friendly, helpful and efficient group of people via email. I was so impressed with the speed they processed our order, artwork approval and printing the artwork, literally within 24 hours - absolutely amazing. I am in Victoria and they are in NSW, so delivery is within 2-3 days - absolutely amazing again. It has been such a wonderful and pleasant experience dealing with the Easy Signs' Customer Happiness Team. Keep up your good work, smiling and being happy!!
